Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Service Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 1 -- 3.34 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hospital Service District No. 1 Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 1 of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of three and thirty-four hundredths (3.34) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $2,199,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating the hospital facilities of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Service Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 2 -- 3.10 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hospital Service District No. 1 Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 1 of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of three and ten hundredths (3.10) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $2,041,460 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, maintaining and operating hospital facilities, in particular the furnishing of ambulance services throughout the Tenth Ward of the Parish, pursuant to an agreement with Ambulance Service District No. 1 of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Drainage District No. 1 -- .90 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Drainage District No. 1 of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a ninety hundredths of one mill (.90) tax on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $495,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of operating and maintaining drainage works within and for the District?
